text.section: This section applies only in Caroline County.

While confined in the Caroline County Jail, an inmate employed under § 11-602 of this title shall pay:
court-ordered payments for restitution; and
the cost of the inmate's food, lodging, and clothing.

The County Commissioners shall:
establish the per diem rate for an inmate's food, lodging, and clothing; and
designate an agent to collect the costs specified in this section.
